response_requirements.initial_response_description: Records available during regular business hours. If in active use or storage, custodian must certify in writing and set date within 3 working days when available
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If not immediately available, must set date within 3 working days for access
response_requirements.extension_notes: Custodian must immediately provide responsive records not in active use; only those in active use may be delayed up to 3 working days

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Custodian bears cost of separating exempt from nonexempt information
fee_structure.advance_payment: May request advance payment if total fees exceed $25

exemptions.description: Records specifically provided confidential by law
Trade secrets and confidential commercial information

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeal specified; court enforcement available

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: May request in person, by phone, mail, fax, email, or electronic means; must be sufficiently specific
requester_requirements.specific_format: Must enable custodian to locate records with reasonable effort

agency_obligations.records_officer_notes: Custodian of records responsible for access
agency_obligations.advance_notice_allowed: May require reasonable advance notice up to 24 hours for inspection
agency_obligations.third_party_review: Custodian or requester may request third party review to determine if inspection consistent with law

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields manually verified from official Arkansas statute. If records in active use, must certify and set date within 3 working days; otherwise immediately available. Reasonable fees; may request advance payment if exceeds $25. Custodian bears cost of separating exempt from nonexempt. Residency requirement - Arkansas citizens only. May require up to 24 hours advance notice for inspection.
